title: Looking for any tobacco card - subject last name Roth
author: Zan

posts.post_title: Looking for any tobacco card - subject last name Roth
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am working on a project and would be interested in any card you may have for sale of a tobacco subject with the last name Roth. Not interested in paying Dean's cards prices on eBay. 

Thanks,
Brian

Lots on eBay.  This one is only $30:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/305418763144[/url]

[quote name="jp1216" post=2417675]Lots on eBay.  This one is only $30:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/305418763144[/url][/QUOTE]

Thanks, I saw this one. I think the seller is also a member here. Would prefer something not trimmed but remains an option of I have bad luck
